about.title: About Stronwell
about.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner in Professional Equipment
about.description: Stronwell specializes in providing high-quality professional equipment solutions to businesses across Latin America and beyond.
about.storyContent: Founded with a vision to bridge the gap between premium quality and affordability, Stronwell has become a trusted name in the professional equipment industry.
about.missionContent: To empower businesses with reliable, professional-grade equipment that enhances productivity and drives growth.
about.visionContent: To be the leading supplier of professional equipment solutions in emerging markets worldwide.
about.qualityDesc: All our products meet international quality standards
about.networkDesc: Extensive dealer network across Latin America
about.contactDesc: Have questions? Our team is here to help you find the right solutions for your business.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have questions? We're here to help. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.
contact.successMessage: Your message has been sent successfully. Our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

partnerEdge.fullDescription: Stronwell helps Latin American distributors break free from overpriced premium brands and unreliable low-end imports—offering trusted performance, solid margins, and scalable growth.
partnerEdge.benefit1Desc: Secure your market with protected territories
partnerEdge.benefit2Desc: Co-branded materials and digital marketing assistance
partnerEdge.benefit4Desc: Attractive pricing structure for sustainable growth
partnerEdge.step4Desc: Start selling and expand your business
